Package gw.api.tools

Class BatchProcess

java.lang.Object
gw.api.tools.BatchProcess
public class BatchProcess extends Object
Manages a batch process for web tools.

      public BatchProcessRunResult runToCompletion()
      Runs the batch process to completion, with a timeout of 5s.
      See Also:
      • runToCompletion(long)

    • runToCompletion

      public BatchProcessRunResult runToCompletion(long timeout)
      Runs the batch process to completion. If the batch process is a work queue, this method will also wait until all the work generated by the batch process is completed by the workers.

      Note that this method times out after a certain amount of time; i.e., it will not wait indefinitely.

      Parameters:
      timeout - the amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait for the batch process to run to completion.

    • runToCompletion

      public BatchProcessRunResult runToCompletion(long timeout, Serializable[] args)
      Runs the batch process to completion with the passed arguments array. If the batch process is a work queue, this method will also wait until all the work generated by the batch process is completed by the workers.

      Note that this method times out after a certain amount of time; i.e., it will not wait indefinitely.

      Parameters:
      timeout - the amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait for the batch process to run to completion.
      args - the argument array to pass to the batch process constructor.
      Returns:
      one of three values:
      • BatchProcessRunResult.FAILURE if the batch process ran to completion in the specified time but encountered errors.
      • BatchProcessRunResult.SUCCESS if the batch process ran to completion in the specified time with no errors.
      • BatchProcessRunResult.TIMEOUT if the batch process did not complete in the specified time.
